Posts.Content: Hello All. My father in law is located in China and is suffering from prostate cancer stage 4. I had bought Zytiga and sent it to China. The price in Israel is very modest compared to other places and they have an international pharmacy called IsraMeds that can send it to almost any place in the world. He has also lowered his PSA from 188 to 12 in just 8 weeks. You can google them up. Shipment arrived to China in 10 days. Maybe they are also able to send it to your father in India. Worth the shot.....
Posts.Title: How can I get Zytiga and MDV3100 at low cost in non US countries? say India

Posts.Content: Hello All. My father in law is located in China and is suffering from prostate cancer stage 4. I had bought Zytiga and sent it to China. Posts.Title: How can I get Zytiga and MDV3100 at low cost in non US countries? say India

Posts.Content: BTW Just in case the Zytiga fails I had also talked to IsraMeds about the availability of Xtandi MDV3100 and they told me they will have it available in the next few weeks. They told me it was just approved in the USA. These guys are angels...
